description.narrative: By the end of 2020, services with a child justice mandate increased their capacity to prevent juvenile delinquency and provide services to children in conflict with the law, including a broader range of options diversion, which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Justice For Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, children and adolescents, especially girls, have access to appropriate and sustainable child protection services in a favourable social environment

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2020, services with a child justice mandate increased their capacity to prevent juvenile delinquency and provide services to children in conflict with the law, including a broader range of options diversion

description.narrative: In 2019, the Country Office supported child justice services to rehabilitate a prison building and provide basic equipment and food. To date, 14 new cases of children in conflict with the law have been separated from adults and every new case is now systematically transferred immediately to the new building; discussions with lawyers were held to provide legal assistance to over 100 cases; 1,105 children in conflict with the law received support from the new judicial services for children and 6,844 pre-delinquent children were provided with prevention support. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/02/2020
